FormDef.Name: Completion Data (to be entered by registered REDCap user only)

ItemGroupDef.Name: Please fill out the information below.

Do you have the following conditions are at increased risk of severe illness from the virus that causes COVID-19: Additional information on these medical conditions is available at: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/need-extra-precautions/people-with-medical-conditions.html
This form is to be filled out by primary contact personnel.
Completion Data (to be entered by registered REDCap user only)

ItemDef.Name: employer_name
ItemDef.redcap:SectionHeader: Please fill out the information below.

Question.TranslatedText: Primary Contact Person Name (First Middle Last)

By checking this box: I attest the information I've provided is truthful and that I am eligible, per SC DHEC guidelines, to receive the COVID-19 vaccine history. I have verified my email address and phone number are entered correctly. I understand I will receive an alert by email or phone (if no email) when I can request a COVID-19 vaccine. I understand this form is not a vaccine request, and I will still need to submit a vaccine request when I receive the alert.
You can choose to Bulk Upload an Employee/Personnel list file or manually input your list
Click the link below to download your data import template as an Excel file. Save it locally to your computer and then open it to begin filling it with the data you wish to import.
Upload the Employee COVID-19 Vaccination Tracking Sheet

Address (Street, City, State ZIP)
22 Beach Rd., Charleston, SC 29403
Have you ever received a dose of COVID-19 vaccine?
If yes, which COVID-19 vaccine product did you receive?
The Priority for the COVID-19 Vaccines

"The patient has indicated that they would like to opt-out from being contacted about potential research studies.
*Check this Box ONLY if the patient has voiced their preference to be removed from receiving ANY further contact about potential research studies. "

Please confirm that the patient no longer wishes to receive future contact about ANY research studies they may qualify for. If they confirm, please state the following: "We have now documented that you no longer want to be contacted about research studies you may qualify for and all reasonable efforts will be made to prevent this contact. Please note, that this does not prevent your doctors from discussing research studies with you when you are seeking clinical care. Also, should you change your mind and want to be contacted about research studies in the future, you can update your preference in MyChart." Have you confirmed and read the participant the above text.
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText:
Please confirm that the patient no longer wishes to receive future contact about ANY research studies they may qualify for. If they confirm, please state the following:

 

"We have now documented that you no longer want to be contacted about research studies you may qualify for and all reasonable efforts will be made to prevent this contact. Please note, that this does not prevent your doctors from discussing research studies with you when you are seeking clinical care. Also, should you change your mind and want to be contacted about research studies in the future, you can update your preference in MyChart."

 

Have you confirmed and read the participant the above text.

Question.TranslatedText:
Subject receptiveness (1 = Least responsive, 5 = most responsive)
- Choose 1 if patient declined the interventions - Choose n/a if you were unable to speak with the patient
Have you ever had a positive test for COVID-19 or has a doctor ever told you that you had COVID-19?
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText: Have you ever had a positive test for COVID-19 or has a doctor ever told you that you had COVID-19?

Question.TranslatedText: The Date of the Last positive Test

Question.TranslatedText: Have you received passive antibody therapy (monoclonal antibodies or convalescent serum) as treatment for COVID-19?
The Date of the Last Passive Antibody Therapy Treatment

ItemDef.Name: are_inc_risk_cancer
ItemDef.redcap:SectionHeader: Do you have the following conditions are at increased risk of severe illness from the virus that causes COVID-19: Additional information on these medical conditions is available at: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/need-extra-precautions/people-with-medical-conditions.html

Question.TranslatedText: Heart conditions, such as heart failure, coronary artery disease, or cardiomyopathies
Immunocompromised state (weakened immune system) from solid organ transplant
Obesity (body mass index [BMI] of 30 kg/m2 or higher but < 40 kg/m2)
